fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Mess with the signage of people's homes. Redirect people who visit target A to target B.
- Perform the factional Mafia kill.
- Create a false path. People who visit your target will be redirected the forest. Any effects to the forest will be visible.
- With the Necronomicon, you may choose to set up hostile animals.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- In the bot, this may appear in either Mafia or Coven color.
- You have access to both factional chats.
- You may win with either faction.
- Both factions may choose to kill you.
- You may self-target.
- You may choose to perform a false ability to either faction.
